contentBlocks.title: General Spa Lighting Timer Requirements
paragraphs: Spa lighting timers must be energy efficient and meet minimum efficiency requirements.
Spa lighting timers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa lighting timers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Spa lighting timers must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.

contentBlocks.title: Energy Efficiency Requirements
paragraphs: Spa lighting timers must meet minimum energy efficiency requirements as specified in the NCC.
Spa lighting timers must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.
Spa lighting timers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa lighting timers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.

contentBlocks.title: Installation Requirements
paragraphs: Spa lighting timers must be installed in accordance with manufacturer's instructions.
Spa lighting timers must be accessible for maintenance and replacement.
Spa lighting timers must be suitable for the intended use of the spa.
Spa lighting timers must be installed by a qualified person.
